Title: Object: Le repos en Egypte
Series: Galerie du Palais Royal
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Pier Francesco Mola: a landscape with in the right foreground the Virgin sitting under a clump of trees and nursing Christ Child; three cherubic heads have appeared above her; St Joseph rests nearby; with engraved text below. c.1786/1808 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Claude Niquet (letter engraver)
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie du Palais Royal', a set published between 1786 and 1808; see 1837,0408.317 for comment. Engraved after a painting which is now in the National Gallery of London (inv. NG160); see Cocke, 1972, cat. No.18.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
